author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND WEAKENING BUT COULD MAKE A BRIEF COMEBACK...
summary: ...FERNAND WEAKENING BUT COULD MAKE A BRIEF COMEBACK... As of 11:00 AM AST Tue Aug 26 the center of Fernand was located near 37.6, -54.6 with movement NE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND WEAKENING BUT COULD MAKE A BRIEF COMEBACK... As of 11:00 AM AST Tue Aug 26 the center of Fernand was located near 37.6, -54.6 with movement NE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
